workflow_name: Automatic Weekly Digital PR Stories Suggestions with Reddit and Anthropic
what_it_does: Automate weekly Reddit trend discovery for digital PR, with AI-driven sentiment analysis and strategic reports‚Äîboost collaboration and campaign impact.
page_title: The Vibe Marketer - 10x Your Speed To Market With AI

assignments.name: Final Report

parameters.content:
## Automatic Weekly Digital PR Stories Suggestions
A weekly automated system that identifies trending news on Reddit, evaluates public sentiment through comment analysis, extracts key information from source articles, and generates strategic angles for potential digital PR campaigns. This workflow delivers curated, sentiment-analyzed news opportunities based on current social media trends. The final comprehensive report is automatically uploaded to Google Drive for storage and simultaneously shared with team members via a dedicated Mattermost channel for immediate collaboration.

### Set up instructions:
1. Add a new credential "Reddit OAuth2 API" by following this [guide](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/reddit/). Assign your Reddit OAuth2 account to the Reddit nodes.
2. Add a new credential "Anthropic Account" by following this [guide]
(https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/anthropic/). Assign your Anthropic account to the nodes "Anthropic Chat Model".
3. Add a new credential "Google Drive OAuth2 API" by following this [guide](https://docs.n8n.io/integrations/builtin/credentials/google/oauth-single-service/). Assign your Google Drive OAuth2 account to the node "Gmail Drive" nodes.
4. Set your interested topics (one per line) and Jina API key in the "Set Data" node. You can obtain your Jina API key [here](https://jina.ai/api-dashboard/key-manager).
5. Update your Mattermost information (Mattermost instance URL, Webhook ID and Channel) in the Mattermost node. You can follow this [guide](https://developers.mattermost.com/integrate/webhooks/incoming/).
6. You can adjust the cron if needed. It currently run every Monday at 6am.

parameters.text:
=Please analyze the following Reddit post and its comments:

CONTEXT:
<Reddit_Post_Info>
Post Title: {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Title.replace(/\"/g, '\\\"') }}
Post Date: {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Date }}
Shared URL: {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.URL }}
Total Upvotes: {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Upvotes }}
Total Comments: {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Comments }}
</Reddit_Post_Info>

Comment Thread Data:
<Reddit_Post_Top_Comments>
{{ $json.markdown.replace(/\"/g, '\\\"') }}
</Reddit_Post_Top_Comments>

Analyze this discussion through these dimensions:

1. CONTENT CONTEXT:
   ‚Ä¢ Main topic/subject matter
   ‚Ä¢ Why this is trending (based on engagement metrics)
   ‚Ä¢ News cycle timing implications
   ‚Ä¢ Relationship to broader industry/market trends

2. SENTIMENT ANALYSIS:
   ‚Ä¢ Overall sentiment score (Scale: -5 to +5)
   ‚Ä¢ Primary emotional undertones
   ‚Ä¢ Sentiment progression in discussion threads
   ‚Ä¢ Consensus vs. controversial viewpoints
   ‚Ä¢ Changes in sentiment based on comment depth

3. ENGAGEMENT INSIGHTS:
   ‚Ä¢ Most upvoted perspectives (with exact scores)
   ‚Ä¢ Controversial discussion points
   ‚Ä¢ Comment chains with deepest engagement
   ‚Ä¢ Types of responses generating most interaction

4. NARRATIVE MAPPING:
   ‚Ä¢ Dominant narratives
   ‚Ä¢ Counter-narratives
   ‚Ä¢ Emerging sub-themes
   ‚Ä¢ Unexplored angles
   ‚Ä¢ Missing perspectives

Output Format (Place inside XML tags <comments_analysis>):

POST OVERVIEW:
Title: [Original title]
Engagement Metrics:
‚Ä¢ Upvotes: [count]
‚Ä¢ Comments: [count]
‚Ä¢ Virality Assessment: [analysis of why this gained traction]

SENTIMENT ANALYSIS:
‚Ä¢ Overall Score: [numerical score with explanation]
‚Ä¢ Sentiment Distribution: [percentage breakdown]
‚Ä¢ Key Emotional Drivers:
  - Primary: [emotion]
  - Secondary: [emotion]
  - Notable Shifts: [pattern analysis]

TOP NARRATIVES:
[List 3-5 dominant narratives]
For each narrative:
‚Ä¢ Key Points
‚Ä¢ Supporting Comments [with scores]
‚Ä¢ Counter-Arguments
‚Ä¢ Engagement Level

AUDIENCE INSIGHTS:
‚Ä¢ Knowledge Level: [assessment]
‚Ä¢ Pain Points: [list key concerns]
‚Ä¢ Misconceptions: [list with evidence]
‚Ä¢ Information Gaps: [identified missing information]

PR IMPLICATIONS:
1. Story Opportunities:
   ‚Ä¢ [List potential angles]
   ‚Ä¢ [Supporting evidence from comments]

2. Risk Factors:
   ‚Ä¢ [List potential PR risks]
   ‚Ä¢ [Supporting evidence from comments]

3. Narrative Recommendations:
   ‚Ä¢ [Strategic guidance for messaging]
   ‚Ä¢ [Areas to address/avoid]

NEXT STEPS CONSIDERATIONS:
‚Ä¢ Key data points for content analysis
‚Ä¢ Suggested focus areas for PR story development
‚Ä¢ Critical elements to address in messaging
‚Ä¢ Potential expert perspectives needed

META INSIGHTS:
‚Ä¢ Pattern connections to similar discussions
‚Ä¢ Unique aspects of this conversation
‚Ä¢ Viral elements to note
‚Ä¢ Community-specific nuances

Focus on extracting insights that will:
1. Inform the subsequent content analysis step
2. Guide PR story development
3. Identify unique angles and opportunities
4. Highlight potential risks and challenges
5. Suggest effective narrative approaches

Note: Prioritize insights that will be valuable for the following workflow steps of content analysis and PR story development. Flag any particularly unique or compelling elements that could inform breakthrough story angles.

messageValues.message: =You are an expert Social Media Intelligence Analyst specialized in Reddit discourse analysis. Your task is to analyze Reddit posts and comments to extract meaningful patterns, sentiments, and insights for PR strategy development.

parameters.text:
=CONTEXT IMPORTANCE:
Reddit data is used as a critical indicator of news story potential because:
‚Ä¢ High upvotes indicate strong public interest
‚Ä¢ Comment volume shows discussion engagement
‚Ä¢ Comment sentiment reveals public perception
‚Ä¢ Discussion threads expose knowledge gaps and controversies
‚Ä¢ Community reaction predicts potential viral spread
‚Ä¢ Sub-discussions highlight unexplored angles
‚Ä¢ Engagement patterns suggest story longevity

INPUT CONTEXT:
News URL: {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.URL }}
News Content:
<News_Content>
{{ $json.content }}
</News_Content>
Reddit Metrics:
‚Ä¢ Post Title (Understanding how the story was shared): {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Title }}
‚Ä¢ Upvotes (Indicator of initial interest): {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Upvotes }}
‚Ä¢ Total Comments (Engagement level): {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Comments }}
Reddit Sentiment Analysis:
<Sentiment_Analysis>
{{ $('Comments Analysis').first().json.text.replace(/[\s\S]*<comments_analysis>/, '').replace(/<\/comments_analysis>[\s\S]*/, '') }}
</Sentiment_Analysis>

For each story, analyze through these dimensions:

1. POPULARITY ASSESSMENT:
   A. Reddit Performance:
      ‚Ä¢ Upvote ratio and volume
      ‚Ä¢ Comment engagement rate
      ‚Ä¢ Discussion quality metrics
      ‚Ä¢ Viral spread indicators
      
   B. Audience Reception:
      ‚Ä¢ Initial reaction patterns
      ‚Ä¢ Discussion evolution
      ‚Ä¢ Community consensus vs. debate
      ‚Ä¢ Information seeking behavior

1. CONTENT ANALYSIS:
   A. Core Story Elements:
      ‚Ä¢ Central narrative
      ‚Ä¢ Key stakeholders
      ‚Ä¢ Market implications
      ‚Ä¢ Industry impact
      
   B. Technical Analysis:
      ‚Ä¢ Writing style
      ‚Ä¢ Data presentation
      ‚Ä¢ Expert citations
      ‚Ä¢ Supporting evidence

2. SOCIAL PROOF INTEGRATION:
   A. Engagement Metrics:
      ‚Ä¢ Reddit performance metrics
      ‚Ä¢ Discussion quality indicators
      ‚Ä¢ Viral spread patterns
      
   B. Sentiment Patterns:
      ‚Ä¢ Primary audience reactions
      ‚Ä¢ Controversial elements
      ‚Ä¢ Support vs. criticism ratio
      ‚Ä¢ Knowledge gaps identified

3. NARRATIVE OPPORTUNITY MAPPING:
   A. Current Coverage:
      ‚Ä¢ Main angles covered
      ‚Ä¢ Supporting arguments
      ‚Ä¢ Counter-arguments
      ‚Ä¢ Expert perspectives
      
   B. Gap Analysis:
      ‚Ä¢ Unexplored perspectives
      ‚Ä¢ Missing stakeholder voices
      ‚Ä¢ Underutilized data points
      ‚Ä¢ Potential counter-narratives

OUTPUT FORMAT (Place inside XML tags <news_analysis>):

STORY OVERVIEW:
Title: [Most compelling angle]
URL: [Source]
Category: [Industry/Topic]

CONTENT SUMMARY:
TLDR: [3-5 sentences emphasizing viral potential]
Core Message: [One-line essence]

KEY POINTS:
‚Ä¢ [Strategic point 1]
‚Ä¢ [Strategic point 2]
‚Ä¢ [Continue as needed]

SOCIAL PROOF ANALYSIS:
Engagement Metrics:
‚Ä¢ Reddit Performance: [Metrics + Interpretation]
‚Ä¢ Discussion Quality: [Analysis of conversation depth]
‚Ä¢ Sentiment Distribution: [From sentiment analysis]

VIRAL ELEMENTS:
1. Current Drivers:
   ‚Ä¢ [What's making it spread]
   ‚Ä¢ [Why people are engaging]
   ‚Ä¢ [Emotional triggers identified]

2. Potential Amplifiers:
   ‚Ä¢ [Untapped viral elements]
   ‚Ä¢ [Engagement opportunities]
   ‚Ä¢ [Emotional hooks not yet used]

NARRATIVE OPPORTUNITIES:
1. Unexplored Angles:
   ‚Ä¢ [Angle 1 + Why it matters]
   ‚Ä¢ [Angle 2 + Why it matters]
   ‚Ä¢ [Angle 3 + Why it matters]

2. Content Gaps:
   ‚Ä¢ [Missing perspectives]
   ‚Ä¢ [Underutilized data]
   ‚Ä¢ [Stakeholder voices needed]

3. Controversy Points:
   ‚Ä¢ [Debate opportunities]
   ‚Ä¢ [Conflicting viewpoints]
   ‚Ä¢ [Areas of misconception]

STRATEGIC RECOMMENDATIONS:
1. Immediate Opportunities:
   ‚Ä¢ [Quick-win suggestions]
   ‚Ä¢ [Timing considerations]

2. Development Needs:
   ‚Ä¢ [Required research]
   ‚Ä¢ [Expert input needed]
   ‚Ä¢ [Data gaps to fill]

PR POTENTIAL SCORE: [1-10 scale with explanation]

Focus on elements that:
‚Ä¢ Show strong viral potential
‚Ä¢ Address identified audience concerns
‚Ä¢ Fill gaps in current coverage
‚Ä¢ Leverage positive sentiment patterns
‚Ä¢ Address or utilize controversial elements
‚Ä¢ Can be developed into unique angles

Note: Prioritize insights that:
1. Build on identified sentiment patterns
2. Address audience knowledge gaps
3. Leverage existing engagement drivers
4. Can create breakthrough narratives
5. Have immediate PR potential

messageValues.message: =You are an expert PR Content Analyst specialized in identifying viral potential in news stories. Your mission is to analyze news content while leveraging Reddit engagement metrics and sentiment data to evaluate news popularity and potential PR opportunities.

parameters.text:
=INPUT CONTEXT:
News Analysis: 
<News_Analysis>
{{ $json.text.replace(/[\s\S]*<news_analysis>/, '').replace(/<\/news_analysis>[\s\S]*/, '') }}
</News_Analysis>
Reddit Metrics:
‚Ä¢ Post Title (Understanding how the story was shared): {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Title }}
‚Ä¢ Upvotes (Indicator of initial interest): {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Upvotes }}
‚Ä¢ Total Comments (Engagement level): {{ $('Set for Loop').first().json.Comments }}
Reddit Sentiment Analysis:
<Sentiment_Analysis>
{{ $('Comments Analysis').first().json.text.replace(/[\s\S]*<comments_analysis>/, '').replace(/<\/comments_analysis>[\s\S]*/, '') }}
</Sentiment_Analysis>

OUTPUT FORMAT (Place inside XML tags <new_stories_report>):

TREND ANALYSIS SUMMARY:
Topic: [News topic/category]
Current Coverage Status: [Overview of existing coverage]
Audience Reception: [From Reddit/sentiment analysis]
Market Timing: [Why now is relevant]

STORY OPPORTUNITIES:

1. FIRST-MOVER STORIES:
[For each story idea (2-3)]

Story #1:
‚Ä¢ Headline: [Compelling title]
‚Ä¢ Hook: [One-line grabber]
‚Ä¢ Story Summary: [2-3 sentences]
‚Ä¢ Why It Works:
  - Audience Evidence: [From Reddit data]
  - Market Gap: [From news analysis]
  - Timing Advantage: [Why now]
‚Ä¢ Development Needs:
  - Research Required: [List]
  - Expert Input: [Specific needs]
  - Supporting Data: [What's needed]
‚Ä¢ Media Strategy:
  - Primary Targets: [Publications]
  - Secondary Targets: [Publications]
  - Exclusive Potential: [Yes/No + Rationale]
‚Ä¢ Success Metrics:
  - Coverage Goals: [Specific targets]
  - Engagement Expectations: [Based on Reddit data]

2. TREND-AMPLIFIER STORIES:
[Same format as above for 2-3 stories]

PRIORITY RANKING:
1. [Story Title] - Score: [X/10]
   ‚Ä¢ Impact Potential: [Score + Rationale]
   ‚Ä¢ Resource Requirements: [High/Medium/Low]
   ‚Ä¢ Timeline: [Immediate/Short-term/Long-term]
   
2. [Continue for all stories]

EXECUTION ROADMAP:
‚Ä¢ Immediate Actions (24-48 hours)
‚Ä¢ Week 1 Priorities
‚Ä¢ Risk Management
‚Ä¢ Contingency Plans

STRATEGIC RECOMMENDATIONS:
‚Ä¢ Core Strategy
‚Ä¢ Alternative Angles
‚Ä¢ Resource Requirements
‚Ä¢ Timeline Considerations

ANALYTICAL FRAMEWORK:

1. TREND VALIDATION:
   A. Story Performance Indicators:
      ‚Ä¢ Reddit engagement metrics
      ‚Ä¢ Public sentiment patterns
      ‚Ä¢ Discussion quality
      ‚Ä¢ Viral elements identified

   B. Current Narrative Landscape:
      ‚Ä¢ Dominant themes from news analysis
      ‚Ä¢ Public perception gaps
      ‚Ä¢ Controversial elements
      ‚Ä¢ Underserved perspectives

2. OPPORTUNITY MAPPING:
   A. Content Gap Analysis:
      ‚Ä¢ Unexplored angles from news analysis
      ‚Ä¢ Audience questions from comments
      ‚Ä¢ Missing expert perspectives
      ‚Ä¢ Data/research opportunities

   B. Timing Assessment:
      ‚Ä¢ News cycle position
      ‚Ä¢ Trend trajectory
      ‚Ä¢ Optimal launch window
      ‚Ä¢ Competition consideration

PR STORY OPPORTUNITIES:
Generate 4-6 high-potential story ideas, categorized as:

A. \"FIRST-MOVER\" OPPORTUNITIES (2-3 ideas):
For each idea:

1. Story Concept:
   ‚Ä¢ Headline
   ‚Ä¢ Sub-headline
   ‚Ä¢ Key message
   ‚Ä¢ Unique selling point

2. Why It Works:
   ‚Ä¢ Gap in current coverage
   ‚Ä¢ Evidence from Reddit discussions
   ‚Ä¢ Sentiment analysis support
   ‚Ä¢ Market timing rationale

3. Development Requirements:
   ‚Ä¢ Required data/research
   ‚Ä¢ Expert perspectives needed
   ‚Ä¢ Supporting elements
   ‚Ä¢ Potential challenges

4. Media Strategy:
   ‚Ä¢ Target publications
   ‚Ä¢ Journalist appeal factors
   ‚Ä¢ Exclusive potential
   ‚Ä¢ Supporting assets needed

B. \"TREND-AMPLIFIER\" OPPORTUNITIES (2-3 ideas):
[Same structure as above, but focused on enhancing existing narratives]

STORY PRIORITIZATION MATRIX:
For each story idea:
1. Impact Potential (1-10):
   ‚Ä¢ Audience interest indicators
   ‚Ä¢ Media appeal factors
   ‚Ä¢ Viral potential
   ‚Ä¢ Business value

2. Resource Requirements:
   ‚Ä¢ Time to develop
   ‚Ä¢ Research needs
   ‚Ä¢ Expert input
   ‚Ä¢ Asset creation

3. Risk Assessment:
   ‚Ä¢ Competition factors
   ‚Ä¢ Timing risks
   ‚Ä¢ Narrative challenges
   ‚Ä¢ Mitigation strategies

EXECUTION ROADMAP:
1. Immediate Actions (Next 24-48 hours):
   ‚Ä¢ Priority research needs
   ‚Ä¢ Expert outreach
   ‚Ä¢ Data gathering
   ‚Ä¢ Asset development

2. Development Timeline:
   ‚Ä¢ Story development sequence
   ‚Ä¢ Key milestones
   ‚Ä¢ Decision points
   ‚Ä¢ Launch windows

3. Success Metrics:
   ‚Ä¢ Coverage targets
   ‚Ä¢ Engagement goals
   ‚Ä¢ Share of voice objectives
   ‚Ä¢ Impact measurements

STRATEGIC RECOMMENDATIONS:
1. Primary Strategy:
   ‚Ä¢ Core approach
   ‚Ä¢ Key differentiators
   ‚Ä¢ Critical success factors
   ‚Ä¢ Risk mitigation

2. Alternative Approaches:
   ‚Ä¢ Backup angles
   ‚Ä¢ Pivot opportunities
   ‚Ä¢ Alternative narratives
   ‚Ä¢ Contingency plans

Focus on creating stories that:
‚Ä¢ Address identified audience interests (from Reddit data)
‚Ä¢ Fill gaps in current coverage
‚Ä¢ Leverage positive sentiment patterns
‚Ä¢ Solve for identified pain points
‚Ä¢ Offer unique, data-backed perspectives
‚Ä¢ Present clear competitive advantages

Based on the provided news analysis, Reddit metrics, and sentiment analysis, please generate a comprehensive PR strategy report following the format above.

messageValues.message:
=You are an elite PR Strategy Consultant specialized in crafting breakthrough story angles that capture media attention. Your mission is to analyze trending story patterns and develop high-impact PR opportunities based on comprehensive data analysis.

CONTEXT IMPORTANCE:
This analysis combines three critical data sources:
1. Reddit Engagement Data:
   ‚Ä¢ Indicates public interest levels
   ‚Ä¢ Shows organic discussion patterns
   ‚Ä¢ Reveals audience sentiment
   ‚Ä¢ Highlights knowledge gaps
   ‚Ä¢ Demonstrates viral potential

2. News Content Analysis:
   ‚Ä¢ Provides core story elements
   ‚Ä¢ Shows current media angles
   ‚Ä¢ Identifies market implications
   ‚Ä¢ Reveals coverage gaps
   ‚Ä¢ Maps expert perspectives

3. Sentiment Analysis:
   ‚Ä¢ Reveals public perception
   ‚Ä¢ Identifies controversy points
   ‚Ä¢ Shows emotional triggers
   ‚Ä¢ Highlights audience concerns
   ‚Ä¢ Indicates story longevity

This combined data helps us:
‚Ä¢ Validate story potential
‚Ä¢ Identify unexplored angles
‚Ä¢ Understand audience needs
‚Ä¢ Predict media interest
‚Ä¢ Craft compelling narratives
